about_the_game:
TRADITIONAL JRPG THAT YOU HAVE BEEN YEARNING FOR

Step into the enchanting realm of Besotted, where nostalgia reigns supreme, evoking the golden era of classic JRPGs from the cherished 90s and early 2000s. Delve into a rich tapestry of lore, beckoning you to unravel its mysteries through exploration and the discovery of countless secrets nestled within the sprawling world of Besotted. Embark on a journey alongside three intrepid heroes, their destinies intricately intertwined amidst the breathtaking fusion of 2D and 3D artistry that defines this timeless JRPG adventure. Each protagonist boasts a profound backstory, intricately woven into the fabric of the overarching narrative.

Remember the thrill of jotting down crucial clues on paper during intricate puzzles, a hallmark of gaming's yesteryears? Rejoice, for that immersive experience returns, seamlessly integrated with modern convenience courtesy of our trusty smartphones' notepad feature, sparing you the hassle of manual transcriptions.
But the adventure doesn't end there. Prepare for a myriad of diversions, from exhilarating arena battles to the pursuit of elusive treasures, indulging in literary escapades, and the gratifying acquisition of property across charming villages. And let's not forget our beloved feline friends, weaving their own captivating tale through heartwarming cutscenes, inviting you to partake in an endearing love story that unfolds alongside your own.

With Besotted, Body Code Games revitalizes the essence of nostalgia, offering an immersive escape into a world brimming with wonder and charm. Prepare to lose yourself in the captivating allure of Besotted—your next epic adventure awaits.

VINIKUS

An orphan whom parent's left him on the doorstep of an orphanage. When he grew up, he learned to hunt and survive off the land with his furry cat friend Butternut. His mission is to find out who and why his parents abandoned him.

FREYA

Freya was living with her mother Luna and their home was raided and attacked by monsters whom was under someone else's control. Freya was able to escape, but her mother was not so lucky and was brutally slayed. Freya seeks revenge and want's to avenge her mother's death and will stop at no cost.

KORLACK

Korlack once was a king until he was dethroned by one of his own men. Left to die, he managed to escape and stay under the radar for 15 plus years undetected. Until he was discovered and now he set's out on a journey to once again regain his throne.

TURNBASED COMBAT

Indulge in Old-School turn based combat.

2D-3D VISUAL ART STYLE

Explore the world of Besotted in this beautiful 2D-3D art style.

short_description: Dive into the world of Besotted. A classic JRPG 2D-3D art style set in a fantasy world with 3 main protagonist. Each with their own deep back stories that's full of death, revenge, love, and destiny. Join the 3 as they team up together all with the same goal in mind.
